document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Somehow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">myself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">survived </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Night </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">entered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">saved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Saved </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">suffice </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Formula </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Henceforth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">living </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">place </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">commuted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">led </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Candidate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Chance </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">dated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Dead. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Somehow myself survived the night
